title: Organizing a Cross-Country USA Road Trip
theme: Driving from New York to Los Angeles
subtopics: Mapping scenic and efficient routes across multiple states
Choosing between renting a car, campervan, or using your own vehicle
Highlighting must-see roadside attractions and landmarks
Finding and booking accommodations along the route
Safety considerations for different climates and terrains
Budgeting for fuel, tolls, food, and lodging
Creating playlists and entertainment for long drives
Planning rest stops and driver rotation for long distances
